# sqlite-amalgamation: The SQLite Amalgamation

<!--
SPDX-FileCopyrightText: 2017 AlgorIT Software Consultancy <https://github.com/algoritnl>

SPDX-License-Identifier: CC0-1.0
-->

Over 100 separate source files are concatenated into a single large file of
C-code named "sqlite3.c" and referred to as "the amalgamation". The
amalgamation contains everything an application needs to embed SQLite.

See also: [The SQLite Amalgamation](https://sqlite.org/amalgamation.html)
